data.title: Athletics Beyond DA - Athletic Hall of Fame
data.meta_description: The Durham Academy Athletic Hall of Fame is comprised of athletes, coaches, and staff members who were outstanding in a sport. View our Athletic Hall of Fame.
data.text:
Established in 2013, the Durham Academy Athletic Hall of Fame comprises alumni athletes, coaches, staff members and administrators who were particularly outstanding in a specific sport and helped to advance athletics at DA in their time at the school.

Five classes have been inducted into the Hall of Fame â€” which now stands at 37 members, representing alumni classes ranging from 1978 to 2016, as well as coaches and supporters spanning the decades. The sixth class of the DA Athletic Hall of Fame will be inducted in December 2024.
